column4: i cant view flash documents in firefox. It asked me to install the adobe flash player... i did however it still does not seem to work. Any ideas?
i clicked on install missing plugins

I had the same problem.. however It worked for me when I installed it "manually" from Adobe's homepage, very simple: http://www.adobe.com/shockwave/download/download.cgi?P1_Prod_Version=ShockwaveFlash
